description: JSON schema for a the result of a search.

found.description: The total number of hits found for this search.

start.description: The zero-based number of the first hit returned in this page of search results.

matchExpression.description: The search match expression parsed from the search request parameters.  This is useful for debugging purposes.

hits.description: The hits in this page of search results

facets.description: The facets found in all results of this search.
